name: StreamDiffusionV2
readme_summary: StreamDiffusionV2 is an open-source interactive diffusion pipeline designed for real-time streaming applications. It offers scalability across various GPU configurations, adjustable denoising steps, and high frame rates to enhance user experience for creators and platforms.
key_features: Real-time streaming applications
Interactive diffusion pipeline
Scalable across diverse GPU setups
Flexible denoising steps
High FPS output
primary_use_case: Enabling real-time, interactive video generation for streaming applications.
cover_image_prompt: A dynamic digital artist, represented as a futuristic AI interface, rapidly sketching and animating vibrant scenes in real-time. The artist is shown with a stream of raw visual data (represented by abstract particles and lines) flowing into a central processing core, which then outputs polished, animated video segments directly onto multiple screens displaying a live stream. Subtle UI elements with sliders for 'denoising steps' and 'FPS' are visible. The overall mood is energetic and creative, with glowing data streams and a clean, modern aesthetic. The illustration should be in a 3D isometric style, emphasizing the flow and transformation of data into dynamic visual content, with the repository name subtly integrated into the interface.

name: guarddog
description: :snake: :mag: GuardDog is a CLI tool to Identify malicious PyPI and npm packages
readme_summary: GuardDog is a command-line interface tool designed to detect malicious packages across various ecosystems including PyPI, npm, Go, GitHub Actions, and VSCode extensions. It employs both source code analysis using Semgrep rules and package metadata heuristics to identify security threats.
key_features: Identifies malicious PyPI and npm packages
Scans Go modules, GitHub actions, and VSCode extensions
Utilizes Semgrep rules for source code analysis
Applies heuristics to package metadata
Supports scanning local and remote packages
Provides options for specific rule selection and exclusion
Outputs results in various formats including SARIF and JSON
Offers Docker image for Windows compatibility
primary_use_case: To enhance software supply chain security by automatically detecting and flagging potentially malicious code within open-source packages and extensions before they are integrated into development workflows.
cover_image_prompt: A vigilant digital watchdog, represented by a stylized, glowing cybernetic dog head, stands guard at a gate. On one side of the gate, a stream of colorful, abstract 'packages' (like small boxes or spheres) are flowing towards the gate. The watchdog's eyes glow intensely, scanning each package. Packages identified as 'malicious' are highlighted in red and are being deflected by a shimmering energy barrier, while 'safe' packages glow green and pass through. Subtle code snippets and data streams are visible in the background, hinting at the digital nature of the scan. The overall mood is secure and protective, with a clean, futuristic aesthetic. The style should be a 3D isometric illustration with vibrant, contrasting colors and clear visual indicators.

name: esp8266-deerma-humidifier
readme_summary: This repository provides custom firmware for the Xiaomi Mi Smart Antibacterial Humidifier (deerma.humidifier.jsq). It replaces the original cloud-dependent firmware with a local MQTT-based control system, enabling cloud-free operation and integration with platforms like Home Assistant.
key_features: Cloud-free operation via local MQTT control
Replaces original firmware on ESP8285 module
Home Assistant Autodiscovery support
WifiManager for on-the-fly configuration
ArduinoOTA for wireless firmware updates
MQTT topics for status, state, and command
JSON-based state reporting and command input
primary_use_case: To enable local, cloud-free control and integration of the Xiaomi Mi Smart Antibacterial Humidifier with smart home systems like Home Assistant.
cover_image_prompt: A vintage, ornate humidifier, typically associated with cloud-based smart home devices, is shown with its power cord unplugged from a wall socket. Instead, it's connected by a glowing, ethereal thread of data to a small, rustic wooden box labeled 'MQTT'. This box is emitting gentle, pulsing waves of information that are clearly controlling the humidifier's mist output and indicator lights. In the background, a stylized, minimalist cloud is depicted as being broken or dissolving, emphasizing the 'cloud-free' aspect. Subtle digital particles emanate from the MQTT box, hinting at the underlying technology. The overall mood is one of liberation and local control. The style should be a 3D isometric illustration with a clean, slightly whimsical aesthetic, focusing on the contrast between the old-fashioned humidifier and the modern, local tech.

name: jaaz
description: The world's first open-source multimodal creative assistant  This is a substitute for Canva and Manus that prioritizes privacy and is usable locally.
readme_summary: Jaaz is an open-source, privacy-focused multimodal creative assistant that functions as a local alternative to tools like Canva and Manus. It enables users to generate images and videos from single prompts, utilize a prompt-free 'Magic Canvas' for intuitive creation, and manage visual storyboards on an infinite canvas, all powered by a smart AI agent system.
key_features: One-Prompt Image & Video Generation
Magic Canvas & Magic Video (Prompt-free creation)
Infinite Canvas & Visual Storyboarding
Smart AI Agent System
Flexible Deployment & Local Assets
Privacy & Security (Local-first)
primary_use_case: To provide users with a local, privacy-respecting, AI-powered creative tool for generating images and videos, similar to Canva but with advanced AI capabilities and prompt-free interaction.
cover_image_prompt: A whimsical, open-source 'creative workshop' where a friendly AI robot is playfully assembling a vibrant digital artwork. The robot uses a 'magic wand' that draws directly onto an infinite canvas, transforming simple sketches and spoken commands (represented by glowing speech bubbles) into stunning images and short videos. Around the workshop, shelves are stocked with 'LEGO' bricks of different art styles and media assets. Subtle UI elements like a 'prompt-free' toggle and a local data lock icon are visible on a nearby workbench, emphasizing privacy and ease of use. The overall style is a bright, 3D isometric illustration with a clean, inviting aesthetic, showcasing the seamless integration of AI creativity and user intuition.

name: osaurus
description: The missing macOS LLM server. Run local or cloud models with OpenAI & Anthropic compatible APIs. MCP server for Cursor & Claude Desktop, menu bar chat, plugins, and dev tools. Native Apple Silicon.
readme_summary: Osaurus is a native macOS LLM server that allows users to run local or cloud-based language models. It provides OpenAI and Anthropic compatible APIs, supports the Model Context Protocol (MCP) for AI agents, and features a plugin system for extensibility, all optimized for Apple Silicon.
key_features: MLX Runtime for optimized local inference on Apple Silicon
Support for remote LLM providers (OpenAI, Ollama, LM Studio, etc.)
OpenAI, Anthropic, and Ollama compatible API endpoints
MCP Server for exposing tools to AI agents
Plugin system for extending functionality with custom tools
Developer tools for debugging and API exploration
Integration with Apple Foundation Models on macOS 14+
Menu bar chat overlay with session history and context tracking
Model manager for downloading and managing models from Hugging Face
primary_use_case: To provide a unified, local LLM server experience on macOS, enabling seamless integration of local and remote models with existing AI tools and agents through compatible APIs and protocols.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled artisan in a cozy, high-tech workshop on a macOS desktop, meticulously crafting intricate gears and circuits that represent different AI language models (local and cloud). The artisan is using a magical hammer that strikes sparks of data, assembling these components into a central, glowing orb that emits friendly chatbot-like speech bubbles and tool icons. Subtle UI elements of the Osaurus app, like a model manager and API explorer, are visible on a nearby screen. The overall mood is one of creation and integration, with a clean, modern aesthetic and soft, inviting lighting, rendered in a 3D isometric illustration style.

name: mixxx
description: Mixxx is Free DJ software that gives you everything you need to perform live mixes.
readme_summary: Mixxx is a free and open-source DJ software available for Windows, macOS, and Linux. It provides a comprehensive set of tools for performing live DJ mixes, supporting various audio formats and hardware controllers.
key_features: Live DJ mixing performance
Cross-platform compatibility (GNU/Linux, Windows, macOS)
Support for various audio formats
Hardware controller integration (MIDI/HID)
Building from source code
primary_use_case: Performing live DJ mixes with digital audio.
cover_image_prompt: A vibrant, energetic scene of a DJ booth where a skilled DJ is seamlessly blending two distinct musical landscapes. One landscape is represented by a flowing river of digital audio waveforms, and the other by a pulsating network of glowing MIDI signals. The DJ, depicted as a conductor of sound, uses intuitive hand gestures to guide these elements into a harmonious mix, creating a mesmerizing visual spectacle. Subtle UI elements of Mixxx, like track waveforms and control knobs, are integrated into the background. The overall mood is dynamic and celebratory, with a focus on the seamless fusion of technology and musical artistry. The style should be a 3D isometric illustration with bright, contrasting colors and a clean, modern aesthetic.
